column2: I'm quite down with this place. It all starts with my love-hate relationship with tapas. Love the small portions
column3: speed at which they are served
column4: the never-know-what-you're-gonna-get way they are plated
column5: etc. Hate the plethora of options and my inability to choose 6 dishes from a menu of 90+ small plates. Yes
column6: I understand that's a personal problem and I am working on it.
